meanings.sent1: The mechanic was fuelling the airplane before its long flight.
meanings.sent2: The gas station attendant was fuelling up the cars that pulled in.
meanings.sent3: The campfire was fuelling the ghost stories being shared.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music was fuelling his desire to learn the guitar.
meanings.sent5: The sun was fuelling the growth of the plants in the garden.

meanings.definition: Providing with the necessary material to sustain or encourage
meanings.sent1: The teacher was fuelling the students' curiosity with interesting facts.
meanings.sent2: The coach was fuelling the team's determination with pep talks.
meanings.sent3: The chef was fuelling the customers' appetites with delicious aromas.
meanings.sent4: Her support was fuelling his confidence to pursue his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The rain was fuelling the river with fresh water for the animals to drink.

meanings.sent1: The fuelling music at the party got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: The fuelling words of encouragement motivated her to keep going.
meanings.sent3: The fuelling scent of fresh cookies made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: His fuelling enthusiasm for the project inspired the team.
meanings.sent5: The fuelling energy of the crowd lifted the performer's spirits.
